text.config.mediachat.title: MediaChat Options
text.config.mediachat.option.maxRamUsage: upper limit of RAM used by media elements in mb
text.config.mediachat.option.mediaChatHe: Determines how many chat lines an image takes up
Should media elements be saved to disk.
Useful if you use mods that restore Chat history.
text.config.mediachat.option.maxCacheSiz:
If the max cache size is exceeded,
the oldest saved media element is deleted
text.config.mediachat.option.displayDebu:
If Infos about the mod should be
displayed in the F3 debug screen
text.config.mediachat.option.autoWrapUrl:
Press <CMD + SHIFT + V> to automatically add
start and end markers to valid URLs
text.config.mediachat.option.maxMediaWid:
Determines the max. media width,
relative to your chat width
text.config.mediachat.option.startMediaU:
Must be entered in the Chat to mark the
beginning of a media element
text.config.mediachat.option.endMediaUrl:
Must be entered in the Chat to mark the
end of a media element
text.config.mediachat.option.hostingServ:
Service use when uploading local images
when the server has file uploading disabled
text.config.mediachat.option.useWhitelis: if enabled, only downloads media from whitelisted websites
text.config.mediachat.option.tenorApiKey:
Input your Tenor API key to use the GIF browser.
For information on how to obtain an API key, type §e/mediachat tenor
text.config.mediachat.category.debugOpti:
These options are mostly for debugging.
If you dont know what you are doing, dont alter them
text.config.mediachat.option.debugOption:
Uses the internal tag names
instead of the ID for
chat tags
text.media.tooltip.sizeError: media bigger than set size limit (%1$s < %2$s)
text.mediachat.media.tooltip.formatError: source URL doesn't point to a file with a supported file format
text.mediachat.media.tooltip.apiError: an API (%1$s) returned an error code (%2$s)
text.mediachat.media.tooltip.internetErr: either you or the source server is offline
text.mediachat.media.tooltip.notFoundErr: Requested Media Element couldn't be found
text.mediachat.tenorApiKeyTutorial.begin: To obtain a Tenor API key follow these steps:

contents.text: Click to open the Tenor API quickstart guide.

text.mediachat.tenorApiKeyTutorial.2: 2. Click on §e"Get a Tenor API Key"§r. (If you cant find this link, it should be almost directly below the §e"Setup"§r title near the top of the page)
text.mediachat.tenorApiKeyTutorial.3: 3. If you arent already logged in, log in with your google account.
text.mediachat.tenorApiKeyTutorial.4: 4. Now a popup with the title §e"Enable Tenor API"§r should be open. Select §e"+ Create a new project"§r from the dropdown menu.
text.mediachat.tenorApiKeyTutorial.5: 5. Enter a descriptive project name, for example §e"MediaChat Tenor API Access"§r and click §e"Next"§r.
text.mediachat.tenorApiKeyTutorial.6: 6. Now click §e"SHOW KEY"§r and copy the key to your clipboard.
text.mediachat.tenorApiKeyTutorial.7.1: 7.1. In Minecraft, if you have the §e"Mod Menu"§r mod installed, open the settings for the §e"MediaChat"§r mod. Paste your API key into the §e"Tenor API Key"§r field and click §e"Done"§r to apply the change.
text.mediachat.tenorApiKeyTutorial.7.2.1: 7.2. If you dont have the §e"Mod Menu"§r mod installed, Open the §e"mediachat.json5"§r file, located at
text.mediachat.tenorApiKeyTutorial.7.2.2: with a text editor and paste your API key in between the two empty quotation marks right of §e"tenorApiKey"§r.

text.mediachat.tenorApiKeyTutorial.discl.text: DO NOT SHARE YOUR API KEY WITH ANYONE. ALSO DO NOT SHARE YOUR MEDIACHAT.JSON SAVE FILE, AS IT CONTAINS YOUR API KEY!

text.mediachat.gifBrowser.apiKeyError.text: Your Tenor API Key appears to be invalid! For information on how to obtain an API key, type

text.mediachat.gifBrowser.connectionErro.text: Either you or the Tenor API are offline. Check your internet connection
